DOC.brief_summary: A prospective, single centre, single arm study designed to collect clinical data on PerClot when used in subjects undergoing endoscopic sinus surgery.
DOC.brief_title: PerClot to Control Bleeding in Endoscopic Sinus Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects having Endoscopic Sinus Surgery Subjects who will have PerClot used as a haemostatic agent Subjects willing and able to give consent Subjects over 18 years old Subjects unable or unwilling to give consent for their data to be collected
